synopsis.text: Ai Enma, the Hell Girl, and her mysterious companions are back in action, fulfilling their duty of transporting tormented souls to Hell. When the clock strikes midnight, those seeking vengeance can access the Hell Correspondence website and enter the name of their enemy. In exchange for the soul of their tormentor, they must be willing to sacrifice their own soul to Hell. As Ai continues her supernatural task, she finds herself being shadowed by a young girl with no memory of her past. The mysterious girl, dressed in green, seems to have a strange connection to Ai's duties as the Hell Girl. Who is this enigmatic child, and what role does she play in Ai's dark world? As the Hell Girl and her companions unravel this new mystery, they remain steadfast in their duty to ferry souls to the underworld.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
